summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Jackson Street to Edmunds Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete walks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7923 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
